welcome.title: Welcome to NCSecMM
welcome.description: Get started by uploading your file

welcomeScreen.evaluateTrackImprove: Evaluate, track, and improve your organization's security maturity with our comprehensive assessment tool.
welcomeScreen.platformBenefits: Our platform provides a comprehensive approach to security maturity assessment with powerful features designed for your success.
welcomeScreen.evaluateAcrossDomains: Evaluate your security posture across multiple domains with our detailed framework.
welcomeScreen.workTogether: Work together with your team to complete assessments and track progress.
welcomeScreen.ncssecDescription: NCSec is a comprehensive security maturity assessment platform designed to help organizations evaluate and improve their security posture.
welcomeScreen.templateDescription: Download our template to get started quickly with your assessment:

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get started with your cybersecurity maturity assessment in just a few simple steps.

step1.title: Choose Your Starting Point
step1.description: Import an existing NCSec file to continue previous work, or start a fresh evaluation from scratch.

step2.title: Complete the Assessment
step2.description: Follow our guided process to evaluate your organization's cybersecurity maturity across all key areas.

step3.title: Collaborate & Improve
step3.description: Work with your team members and generate comprehensive reports with actionable recommendations.

getStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStarted.description: Choose how you'd like to begin your cybersecurity maturity assessment.
getStarted.helpText: Both options will guide you through the complete assessment process.

cta.title: Strengthen Your Cybersecurity Posture Today
cta.description: Join organizations worldwide who trust NCSec Platform to assess and improve their cybersecurity maturity.

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 NCSec Platform. Streamlining cybersecurity maturity assessments for organizations worldwide.

export.successDescription: The NCSecMM file has been exported successfully.
export.errorDescription: An error occurred while exporting the file.

fileUpload.title: Upload File
fileUpload.dragDropText: Drag and drop your file here, or
fileUpload.fileReadyToUpload: File is ready to be uploaded
fileUpload.invalidFileTypeMessage: Please upload an Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV file
fileUpload.fileTooLargeMessage: File size should be less than 5MB
fileUpload.noFileSelectedMessage: Please select a file to upload

warning.title: Warning
warning.message: Are you sure you want to proceed?

actions.exportDescription: The data for domain {{name}} has been exported successfully
actions.exportErrorDescription: An error occurred while exporting the data
actions.reportDescription: The report for domain {{name}} has been generated successfully
actions.reportErrorDescription: An error occurred while generating the report

toast.descriptionErrorInput: Please enter valid profile values (1-5, target >= current)

objectives.title: Governance Practices
objectives.total: Total Governance Practices in this process
